bibl.title: Glass Corrosion - the Cause of the White / Grey Precipitation on the Insides of Papyrus Glass Frames.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.note: Brief history of papyrus conservation. - The white / grey precipitation. - Components of papyrus as raw material. - The components of float glass. - Thesis for the white / grey sediment on the insides of papyrus glass frames. - Summary and perspectives. - Avec résumé en allemand.
bibl.seg: Jörg Graf, Glass Corrosion - the Cause of the White / Grey Precipitation on the Insides of Papyrus Glass Frames.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 23 (2016) pp. 47-56, 3 figg. coul.

Brief history of papyrus conservation. - The white / grey precipitation. - Components of papyrus as raw material. - The components of float glass. - Thesis for the white / grey sediment on the insides of papyrus glass frames. - Summary and perspectives. - Avec résumé en allemand.
